pageContext.claim: “In Pennsylvania, partisan Democrats have allowed ballots in the state to be received three days after the election, and we think much more than that. And they are counting those without even postmarks or any identification whatsoever. So you don't have postmarks; you don't have identification.”
pageContext.analysis: In this stew of falsehoods, Trump does not mention that the U.S. Supreme Court allowed these ballots to be counted up to three days later. It requested that the ballots be segregated in case of disputes but not enough were received to make a difference in the outcome.
